title: "Untitled"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r results='asis'}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

plots = dir("docs", pattern = "*.jpg|.jpeg",full.names = TRUE)  
 
walk(plots, ~cat("![](", file.path(.x)))


plots <- list.files("docs")

for(i in plots){
  filename <- file.path("docs", i)
  cat("![text](",filename,")")
}

```
